謶字的基本解释

謶
zhuó
谪。
欺。

謶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shù］
［《集韻》商署切，去御，書。］
同“庶1”。
(1)希冀。
(2)作人名用字。宋有赵崇謶。见《宋史·宗室世系表十五》。

謶字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　謶； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1178第18
【廣韻】之若切【集韻】職略切，?音灼。【廣雅】謫也。【類篇】欺也。　又【集韻】商署切，音恕。冀也，通作庶。　又【集韻】之奢切，音遮。多言也。與嗻同。　【字彙補】亦書作?。

謶字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
謶字的起名意思

暂无。

謶
Basic explanation of words
謶
zhuó
disgrace.
bully.
謶
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shù］
["Jiyun" Commercial Office cut, go to imperial, book. ]
Same as "庶1".
(1) Hope.
(2) Use words for names. Song You Zhao Chongying. See "Song History·Family Lineage Table 15".
謶
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　謶; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1178 Page 18
[Guang Yun] If cut [Ji Yun] slightly cut,? Yin Zhuo. [Guang Ya] Desperate. 【Classes】Deception.　 [Ji Yun] The Commercial Office cuts, the sound is forgiving. Ji Ye is a master.　[Jiyun] The extravagant cut, the sound is hidden. Talk more. Same as 嗻.　【Word Supplement】Also book for?.
